Html:
I followed the guide for the 21 update and made some changes along the way....

Ignored JavaQuickStarter and adjusted the msi id for update 51

However when the update tries to install via WSUS, the JAva install screen pops up for you to click next. It appears the /s parameter is not working.

When I run it manually with the /s, the install works silently, to me it appears the parameter is not being passed through?

Any suggestions?
REvise the update and ensure the /S parameter is present in the command-Line textbox.
